name: Chickpea Korma
instructions: Blend onion, ginger, and garlic into a paste
Heat oil in large pan over medium heat, then stir in onion paste and cook for ~1-2 minutes until fragrant
Add chickpeas, jalapenos, cashews, and tomato sauce
Mix all spices together with a little bit of water, to create a paste and add to the pan. Cook for 10 minutes stirring often
Add green peas and coconut milk. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes stirring often
Turn off heat and add cilantro, reserve some for garnish.
Serve with rice and garnish with fresh cilantro leaves

additional_context.story: Tori and Jory lived together in university and Jory taught Tori how to cook on a budget. This was one of our go-to meals that was quick, easy, and delicious!
additional_context.tips: Let the onions cook for longer than you think to make sure the strong onion flavour is cooked away.
